headers.header_text: PORT 206 section 001, will be a hybrid course:  MWF will meet on campus and TTh will consist of online activities. Course fulfills GE Languages of Learning requirement. Students enrolled in the course may also be eligible to take the Portuguese Challenge Exam for 12 credits (see Dept. of Spanish and Portuguese website for more information).

catalog.description: Intensive development of oral and literacy skills at the ﻿Intermediate High﻿ to ﻿Advanced Low﻿ level, with emphasis on improving grammatical accuracy, fluency, and cultural competence.  Intended to prepare students for Port 321 and subsequent courses.
catalog.prerequisite: Port 202 or Port 205 or equivalent experience.
catalog.title: Intensive Portuguese Skills Development.
